PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13262013-12-05,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Health Transfer, Canada Social Transfer and Wait Times Reduction Transfer Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA HEALTH TRANSFER, CANADA SOCIAL TRANSFER AND WAIT TIMES REDUCTION TRANSFER REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the legislative renewal of the four major federal transfer programs; (2) implement the set of technical changes announced for Equalization and Territorial Formula Financing (TFF); (3) clarify various aspects of the calculation of Equalization and TFF; (4) establish the timing of estimates and final computations of the Canada Health Transfer and Canada Social Transfer starting in 2014-15; and (5) update and rationalize the regulatory regime for the major transfer programs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0224 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
